website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Ativ Book 9 2014 Edition should be on your short list if you want a premium, long-lasting ultrabook, but don't need a higher-than-HD display.
pros: Slimmer, lighter design and larger display than previous iteration
Fourth-generation Intel Core i5 processor and 128GB solid-state drive keep things speedy
cons: Full HD rather than Quad HD+ display on previous model
Dongles required for VGA and Ethernet
Slightly higher price than previous iteration

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is beautiful,however, after a few times of opening and closing the laptop, the LCD is starting to detach from the aluminum body. There is no physical damage to the machine. This seems like poor workmanship that isn't acceptable for the price paid for this unit. I contacted support and they will inspect and repair the unit but it will take 2-3 weeks. All this for a unit that is less than a month old... UPDATE: Well they repaired the laptop fairly quickly (1 Week) and it just like new again. Hopefully the LCD screen stays in place this time.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding machine! It's fast and easy to use. i agree with some of the other reviews; the screen resolution could be better (especially at this price) But it's pretty good. I love the fact that it's slim and lightweight- it will be much easier to travel with. It comes with some Samsung software which I have not explored yet. I had a huge problem with the way it was packaged. it was sent in a huge box with no protection around the laptop box. The box was large enough for 4 laptops! I left a separate feedback on that.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ed

customer_reviews.title: Love the laptop
customer_reviews.text: Love the laptop. Great screen and keyboard. Good battery life for such a large screen and processor speed. Makes for a perfect work laptop. Careful with the password. It is possible to recover if you use the windows password, but if you choose a local pin, then don't forget it. Otherwise, you will need to restore everything from scratch. Bad news. So, I recommend sticking with your microsoft password to unlock the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and fast, but be careful of the storage..
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful device (I type on it now). The only drawback is the small hard drive size, which makes you make choices. Music? on a very nice flash drive. Pictures? External hard drive... But it is very fast for daily tasks, boots so quickly, and is stunning. Really, Samsung is making some pretty products now.
customer_reviews.author: Mjolnir. PMA

customer_reviews.title: great graphics, lightning quick boot-up
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous look, great graphics, lightning quick boot-up. My only complaint, fairly annoying, is that two of my video players (VLC and Videolan) insist on downloading files before streaming them. Microsoft Media Player doesn't do this. However, I like the other players better. If anyone has a suggestion of how to avoid this, please post it!
customer_reviews.author: Relieved Parent

customer_reviews.title: Thanks to the SSD it starts in seconds and the battery easily lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop the day before a last-minute business trip. It's gorgeous and flawless. Thanks to the SSD it starts in seconds and the battery easily lasts all day. I am delighted with it and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction of monitor, screen came apart, no warranty after 12 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this laptop until the screen has come apart, 14 months into usage. I never taken it outside my house. The monitor has come apart as the quality of its construction is poor. Samsung would not cover any fixes to its hardware after 12 months. Now I am stuck with a monitor which cost me $1,300 and cannot be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Freud

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Had it only a day but this thing is AMAZING. Easy to set up, network with my home network, ... a bit of bloatware but not a lot. Previously bought a top-of-the-line Dell XPS 13 but it had an issue with making annoying electronic noise... they let me return it, and I got this. Wish I had bought this in the first place... it is more money but WOW the bigger screen and build quality is tremendous. Feels solid. Under 4 pounds ... and the battery is great for such a big screen. Also, the trackpad and keyboard are superior. Only thing I wish it had was if the AC adapter plugged straight into the wall. Bravo, Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Brian E

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Has a high quality feel about it and the performance is excellent. And I love the backlit keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not too pleased with it. Especially considering its price. Lots of issues with hardware.
customer_reviews.author: MUzJAAHID

customer_reviews.title: However the display is not good. Too much glare - I prefer matte screens
customer_reviews.text: The laptop itself is built very solid and doesn't look cheap. However the display is not good. Too much glare - I prefer matte screens. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: cooley

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome computer! Everything works perfectly, I get 12 hours of battery life as long as I'm not doing too intense stuff, and it's very portable and light. The only bad thing I can think of is sometimes the touchpad is a little behind when you scroll really fast. It's more of a minor inconvenience than a problem
customer_reviews.author: GRANT B.

customer_reviews.title: Really like this ultra book
customer_reviews.text: Really like this ultra book. The touch of the keyboard is really nice. Have had NO problems with it. Travels well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Real nice laptop, I have no problems with it
customer_reviews.text: Real nice laptop, I have no problems with it. I can play osu! just fine (just lower some unnecessary particles and it'll run without lag), I can also play minecraft without tweeking the settings much. The keyboard is decent for casual typing but not the best if you're planning to play games with consecutive tapping of one key.
customer_reviews.author: Kinu Tofu

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: Two months ago I would've given this computer five stars with no problem - it was beautiful, fast, light, quick to boot and easy to use. Then, with no external cause or point of impact, the LCD display cracked. I contacted Samsung about the problem and was blown off - told it would cost in excess of $600 to fix it. After they refused to discuss the matter with me I have decided I've purchased my last Samsung laptop (I had two prior ones I was very pleased with). My advice is DO NOT buy this computer, but if you, make sure you purchase buyer protection and don't end up like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Sloan Young

customer_reviews.title: ... top was for my wife and she seems to like it.
customer_reviews.text: the lap top was for my wife and she seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: giovanni

customer_reviews.title: exceptional computer
customer_reviews.text: The best computer I've ever owned fast, reliable, sleek, and has many options. I love the ac wireless adapter, less then a second and the webpage appears, battery life is exceptional. I just love it
customer_reviews.author: Sameh Sarkis

customer_reviews.title: Love it, touch screen is smooth and the I5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, touch screen is smooth and the I5 processor functions smoothly. My only complaint is that the price may not have been worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: Design is nice and all..
customer_reviews.text: Trackpad was horrible, windows 8.1 is a mess.. and i5 with 8GB RAM just doesn't hold up to how fast it's supposed to be. WiFi is very spotty; returned this one for an i7 model.. same problems. Going with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: sparks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful fast laptop, great buy, bought two for my bosses, they think i'm amazing...
customer_reviews.author: chadsnet

product_meta.title: Samsung ATIV Book 9 2014 Edition 15.6-Inch Touchscreen Laptop (Intel Core i5, Mineral Ash Black)
product_meta.description:
Enjoy powerful performance and portability with the Samsung ATIV Book 9 (2014 Edition). Measuring a mere 0.63 inches thin, this sleek, lightweight Windows 8.1 laptop features a 15.6-inch Full HD touchscreen display, along with an Intel Core i5 processor for fast multitasking. A lossless audio player delivers studio-quality sound for music and movies. The long battery life--up to 8.8 hours*--lets you use the laptop wherever you are. 

Powerful Intel Core i5 processor and solid state drive easily handle demanding tasks.
View larger.

Light and thin design ensures maximum portability. View larger.

Curved keycaps for comfortable typing; touchpad calibrated for precision. View larger.

15.6-inch Full HD touchscreen display. View larger.

INTEL CORE I5 PROCESSOR FOR FAST PERFORMANCE
Experience faster, better performance thanks to this laptop's 4th generation Intel Core i5 processor. The i5 delivers improved graphics, battery life, and security along with Intel Hyper-Threading Technology, which allows the processor core to work on two tasks simultaneously. This enables you to watch HD movies, create PowerPoint presentations, and multitask with ease while enjoying a display that is quick, crisp, and lifelike. 

VIBRANT FULL HD DISPLAY FOR MOVIES AND MORE
Great for watching movies, playing online games, or simply browsing the Web, the ATIV Book 9 (2014 Edition) has a large 15.6-inch Full HD (1920x1080) touchscreen for exceptional picture quality and wide viewing angles. Capacitive touch technology allows you to take full advantage of Microsoft Windows 8.1 interactive features and get more done more quickly. The anti-reflective screen reduces glare so you can see more clearly.

Up to 8.8 hours* of battery life on a single charge. View larger.

WORK AND PLAY FOR HOURS WITHOUT RECHARGING
The ATIV Book 9 (2014 Edition) offers up to 8.8 hours* of battery life on a single charge, allowing you to get work done on a plane or at a coffee shop, or use the laptop wherever you are, without worrying about finding an electrical outlet. 

SLIM, STURDY, ALUMINUM DESIGN FOR PORTABILITY
Measuring just 0.63 inches thin, and weighing only 3.92 pounds, the ATIV Book 9 (2014 Edition) features a sleek aluminum shell that's light enough to take with you on the go, yet durable enough to withstand bumps and scrapes that can occur with everyday wear and tear. 

IMMERSIVE AUDIO FOR MUSIC, GAMES, AND MORE
With the ATIV Book 9 (2014 Edition), you can enjoy an immersive audio experience, whether you're enjoying a YouTube video or listening to music while you're working. A lossless audio player and FLAC playback compatibility deliver sound the way it was originally recorded, without any loss in quality from audio compression. 

ERGONOMIC KEYBOARD FOR FAST, ACCURATE TYPING
For good looks and optimal performance, the ATIV Book 9 (2014 Edition) sports a stylish, contemporary keyboard with gently curved key caps that cushion the fingertips while you're typing. The laptop's touchpad has been scientifically calibrated for precision and accuracy as well as fast response wakeup from Sleep Mode. 

AMPLE PORTS TO CONNECT PERIPHERALS AND MORE
To make it easy to connect a printer, an external keyboard or monitor, or other peripheral devices, the ATIV Book 9 (2014 Edition) comes equipped with two USB 3.0 ports and a USB 2.0 port, along with an HDMI port, a mini Ethernet port, a mini VGA port, and a headphone out/microphone-in combo port.

PRODUCT INFORMATION
This laptop comes installed with Microsoft Windows 8.1 (64-bit), has a 15.6-inch touchscreen display, and contains an Intel Core i5 processor and an Intel HD Graphics 4400 graphics card. It offers 8 GB of system memory and 128 GB of SSD storage. The laptop measures 0.63 by 14.74 by 9.84 inches (H x W x D) and weighs 3.92 pounds.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung ATIV Book 9 (2014 Edition) laptop computer, AC adapter, LAN dongle, Samsung Link software, Samsung SideSync software, S Player+ software, and S PhotoStudio software. 

*Based on MobileMark 2012 test scores that will vary based on configuration.

ATIV BOOK 9 (2014 EDITION)
AT A GLANCE:
 * Microsoft Windows 8.1 (64-bit) operating system
 * Intel Core i5 processor for fast performance
 * 15.6-inch Full HD (1920x1080) touch screen display
 * Aluminum body measures just 0.63 inch thin
 * Up to 8.8 hours* of battery life on one charge

Port info. View larger.

Ultra-slim, incredibly strong aluminum body. View larger.



AMAZON.COM
